sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An Occasional letter containing some thoughts about a national reformation and recommended to the consideration of the parochial clergy and others.
32, 6 p.
Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., London : 1698.
"Some modern books proper to be recommended, upon this occasion, to the reverend and parochial clergy", and "Some books proper to be recommended to the nobility, gentry, &c."--P. 1-6 at end. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library. Includes bibliographies.
=======
An Occasional letter containing some thoughts about a national reformation and recommended to the consideration of the parochial clergy and others.
32, 6 p.
Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., London : 1698.
"Some modern books proper to be recommended, upon this occasion, to the reverend and parochial clergy", and "Some books proper to be recommended to the nobility, gentry, &c."--P. 1-6 at end. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library. Includes bibliographies.
Brabazon Aylmer
>>>>>>> imprintparse
